Package org.neo4j.io.fs

Class PhysicalFlushableChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.io.fs.PhysicalFlushableChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, FlushableChannel, WritableChannel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PhysicalFlushableChecksumChannel
    public class PhysicalFlushableChannel
extends Object
implements FlushableChannel
    The main implementation of FlushableChannel. This class provides buffering over a simple StoreChannel and, as a side effect, allows control of the flushing of that buffer to disk.

      • prepareForFlush

        public Flushable prepareForFlush()
                          throws IOException
        External synchronization between this method and close is required so that they aren't called concurrently. Currently that's done by acquiring the PhysicalLogFile monitor.
        Specified by:
        prepareForFlush in interface FlushableChannel

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        External synchronization between this method and emptyBufferIntoChannelAndClearIt is required so that they aren't called concurrently. Currently that's done by acquiring the PhysicalLogFile monitor.
        Specified by:

        Specified by:

        public long position()
              throws IOException
        Returns:
        the position of the channel, also taking into account buffer position.

      • position

        public void position​(long position)
              throws IOException
        Sets position of this channel to the new position. This works only if the underlying channel supports positioning.
        Parameters:
        position - new position (byte offset) to set as new current position.
        Throws:
        IOException - if underlying channel throws IOException.
